problem_text_cn: 如图,在▱ABCD中,AD=2AB,CE平分∠BCD交AD边于点E,且AE=3,则AB的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ▱ABCD, AD = 2AB, CE bisects ∠BCD and AD edge at point E, and AE = N_0, then the length of AB is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB=DC,AD∥BC,∴∠DEC=∠BCE,∵CE平分∠DCB,∴∠DCE=∠BCE,∴∠DEC=∠DCE,∴DE=DC=AB,∵AD=2AB=2CD,CD=DE,∴AD=2DE,∴AE=DE=3,∴DC=AB=DE=3,故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查了平行四边形性质,平行线性质,角平分线定义,等腰三角形的性质和判定的应用,关键是求出DE=AE=DC．
